name: SNAKE vs APPLE
description: SNAKE vs APPLE Is a fun and Entertaining Snake type game where you Eat Apples to grow your Snake and get a high score it saves the high score so you can try beat it later. I really hope you enjoy this game as i worked really hard on it and its my first finished game ive done so far. Feel free to download this for free Donations Welcome as it will help make more and better games in the future. Feedback always Welcome. Hope you Enjoy Spider Games.
